lead_paragraph: Rickie Fowler broke down in tears in the media center after his playoff loss Sunday in the Waste Management Phoenix Open, overcome by emotion talking about his family.

headline.print_headline: Hideki Matsuyama Beats Rickie Fowler in Phoenix Open Playoff
headline.main: Hideki Matsuyama Beats Rickie Fowler in Phoenix Open Playoff
